unpublishedCollection.name: make
unpublishedCollection.body: export default { build: `1. Use a Tab widget. 2. First tab will be for loading screen (Default tab 1). 3. Second tab will have the dashboard. 4. Create a JS Object called setup, from there do the page load validation and if successful go to the dashboard tab. 5. Check the default tab property of the Tab widget. 6. Lastly, set the Show Tabs property to false` }

variables.name: build
variables.value: `1. Use a Tab widget. 2. First tab will be for loading screen (Default tab 1). 3. Second tab will have the dashboard. 4. Create a JS Object called setup, from there do the page load validation and if successful go to the dashboard tab. 5. Check the default tab property of the Tab widget. 6. Lastly, set the Show Tabs property to false`
